channel.title: How do i adjust this?
channel.description: how do i adjust the exp rate for both skills and combat? right now its set way to high. i have the exp rate set as 0.3 on the easyrsc control panel, and people still are getting 15 or 16 levels from level 1. i know you fix it in the formulae.java but i am not sure exactly how to do it. Does anybody got a guide for my problem? i searched it on the forums but found no results. or can anyone help me? Much appreciated

item.title: How do i adjust this?
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

add exp[i] += amount * 10D; to it in player.java.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i adjust this?
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

…You’re an idiot, the Exp multiplier is only for combat stats, to change the experience received for skilling stats you need to edit XML’s, which I’m sure you’re pretty familiar with.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i adjust this?
item.dc:creator: @Pandemicpk Pandemicpk
item.description:
@Pandemicpk wrote:

i said i fucking did that you fuck tard… i am pretty sure when the exp in the control panel is 35x and i am getting 39k per log i get from a tree, that the skill exp is fucked. and the only way to change to even it all out is forumlae. i mean the fucking exp rate is 0.3x and i am still getting 16 levels from level 1 as i said. fucking learn to read and don’t flame on peoples topics unless your actually going to help them.

p.s this message is for imthenull

and dude wtf, did i say i am trying to boost it? i said i am trying to adjust it cause the exp rate is all wack. i am pretty sure i don’t want my server to get from 1-16 attack from killing one man. obviously i am trying to lower the exp.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i adjust this?
item.dc:creator: @z21 z2
item.description:
@z21 wrote:

You COULD switch the rank from a regular user, to a subscriber, then boost all the xp at once by upping the subscriber rate.
